description: This course revolves around the instructor's actual purchase, seven year ownership, and profitable sale of a 6-unit apartment building in a mid-size Southern city. Almost any question an aspiring property mogul might have is covered in this course with real world answers provided from the ownership of the 6-plex. This course is a time machine created to rocket you seven years along the learning curve. You will learn to skip common mistakes and focus on building your empire. The instructor is a former finance professor...one of the classes he taught was Real Estate Investing. You will be in the best possible hands to learn the academic and real world necessities of rental property ownership as your instructor takes you through his seven year ownership of the 6-plex. You have a decision to make: are you going to continue to listen to the voices in your head that have held you back, or will you let this course help you join the 1%?
title: Learn How I Bought These Apartments: Now, It's Your Turn
instructors: Max Profit | Former Finance Professor | Real Estate Expert
